extendedInfo.description: Before you give your child an Android phone, install Android Parental Controls and talk with your child about the risks that come with a mobile phone. Parental Controls let parents limit how their child's phone operates and avoid misuse and to keep them safe.My Mobile Watchdog includes:Parental Control for Android PhonesText Tracker / Monitor Text MessagesPicture Tracker / Monitor Photo MessagesPhone TrackerChild GPS Tracker (Currently available only on the web... coming soon to the Android app!)My Mobile Watchdog is the only Parental Control for Android used by FBI and Law Enforcement to stop over 2,000 predators.Go to www.mymobilewatchdog.com to learn more about Parental Controls for Android including how to monitor text messages.

reviews.title: Convenient access
reviews.comment: HTC DNA - Works well for a parent to monitor their child\'s phone without having to use a PC. Location doesn\'t seem to be working in the app, but works great on the PC.
reviews.author: Eric Weller

reviews.title: NEVER WORKS
reviews.comment: I have a galaxy sII and this app was working so well.....now I have not been able to sign in from my phone for over two months!! Keeps telling me \"unable to recieve data from server\" I can sign on from my PC but the app is called My MOBILE watchdog for a reason!! Now even the location section isn\'t working on the PC. So frustrated.....I used to tell everyone to get this app if they have kids with cell phones.....I will not recommend it anymore.
reviews.author: Stacy Willard

reviews.title: Awesome, easy to use!
reviews.comment: I love how easy this app is to see my childs activity. It is awesome to be able to block access and delete contacts so easily. As long as my child has a phone I will use Mobile Watchdog!
reviews.author: Cassie Miramontes

reviews.title: Great app for kids phones!
reviews.comment: I wanted an app that I could use to keep my 12 year old safe with his new cell phone. I wanted to protect him from bullies and predators. This app works great!! I had some software issues with the parent app and they immediately fixed the problem and it work great! Worth every penny!
reviews.author: Kim Hernandez

reviews.title: Great potential, but a lot of bugs right now.
reviews.comment: I recently installed MMWD on my phone and my children\'s phones.  So far, my experience has been rather dodgy.  Here\'s the breakdown:  THE GOOD -  I had no problems purchasing/installing/configuring the app on my phone or my children\'s phones. -  Some of the features that have worked very well include text monitoring, contact monitoring/syncing, and alerts when sending/receiving texts to/from selected contacts or unknown contacts.    THE BAD -  Location tracking using parental app on my SGS3 does not work, P
reviews.author: William Martin

reviews.title: Up dated!!!!need to buy.
reviews.comment: This has worked very well for my 2 kids. it\'s nice to have some comfort.
reviews.author: John Glover

reviews.title: On the road to happy?
reviews.comment: Was having difficulties and had quick response from them. Giving it a try for a few more months. I loved this app before and really hope it continues to be as awesome as it was!
reviews.author: Amelia Messenger

reviews.title: Confused
reviews.comment: Works great on PC and worked great on tablet for a couple hours. Now app has a popup that says \"Error loading data\". What does that mean and why did it stop working?
reviews.author: Tim O\'Born

reviews.title: Pretty decent
reviews.comment: Our teenager HATES this app. We know she has tried to get around it. She did successfully for about a day and then she started having problems with her phone, right afterwards we started seeing notifications again. It will allow you to see all websites, calls, and read all texts unless they are picture messages (may need fixing), but not emails or texts/calls through apps like Pinger or Facebook. Online has more options for viewing than app but some don\'t work. Overall, its good enough for our needs.
reviews.author: Ernesto Nunez Hernandez

reviews.title: So far good thing
reviews.comment: So far this is working great, just need the location part fixed, it won\'t work
reviews.author: KRISTINA GOFF

reviews.title: Too easy for child to delete!
reviews.comment: Wow, my kid had this app deleted within 24 hours. Now I can\'t get it installed and synced again. Great app if you only want it working for 24 hrs.
reviews.author: Jeannie Haynes

reviews.title: Superb!
reviews.comment: This app is exactly what I was looking for when we bought my 12 year old her first phone. You have total control as a parent with regards to contacts, apps, usage, web sites, etc. I would highly recommend this app to any parent.
reviews.author: Bryn Tyler

reviews.title: Outstanding!!
reviews.comment: So many options, easy to operate, and very affordable!! (Location doesn\'t work but great app)
reviews.author: Sandy Capps

reviews.title: Not the best
reviews.comment: But it works good for android. Forget it if you kids have iPhone
reviews.author: Gammer Thumbs

reviews.title: Wth- UGHHHHH
reviews.comment: Just when you think it\'s working great-BAM! That message pops up. ERROR: \"Log In Error\" However this time it\'s not only doing that, it\'s BLOCKING EVERY WEBSITE HE TRIES TO GO TO. C\'mon. When it works, I love it so but y\'all need to get it checked out right. I\'m not giving up on this app yet- I HAVE HOPE IT\'LL GET BETTER, THEY\'LL FIX ALL THE GLITCHES!!
reviews.author: Angela Kingston

reviews.title: Really disappointed
reviews.comment: I wad expecting alot more out of the app.  It never reported the notifications as discribed.  I found very bad thing on my sons phone without notification.  Does not work well with andriod phones.  Poor customer service.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Has never worked.  I have it on 3 phones and they are charging  me 20 dollars per month and I can\'t get ahold of anyone to cancel.  Buyer beware.\tHas never worked. I have it on 3 phones and they are charging me 20 per month.  I can\'t get ahold of anyone to cancel.  Buyer beware.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Was a little skeptical with the previous comments left for this app.....   I absolututely love it !  I do get notified about stuff but u have to have it marked as suspicious been using for 2 months now I know what my youngin is up to at all times can see everything .... I highly recommend this app to anyone with teenagers....
reviews.author: A Google User
